title: Byron and Kit
description: "Kit will want what she wants…"Truer words were never spoken. The sleek, sexy shapeshifter knows what she wants. She wants Byron, the Master vampire she swore to serve.Too bad he doesn't want her…or does he?Byron wants her, all right. But he made a promise to care for her. Caring for her doesn't involve doing all the dirty, delicious things he imagines doing. Determined to keep his promise, he sends her away. But Kit will want what she wants…and what she wants is him…This book has been previously published. It has been expanded and revised. This book contains an old-fashioned master vampire, a stubborn werewolf, sex, misunderstandings, sex, unrequited love, and sex. Did I mention the sex? Don't say you weren't warned…
author: Shiloh Walker
